CINE_ClimbUp.synopsis: Cinematic Cutscene with the character using a ladder to get from the Underdark to the Goblin Camp
CINE_ClimbUp.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto 153.71, 64.79, -263.724. Click on the ladder - will launch the cinematic.5. ReCon: "oe und_cine_reset" -  this will allow to see the cinematic again when clicking on the ladder (by default the game shows it only once)

CINE_ClimbDown.synopsis: Cinematic Cutscene with the character using a ladder to get from the Goblin Camp to the Underdark
CINE_ClimbDown.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. in recon oe UND_TransitionCinematic_ClimbDown4. ReCon: "oe und_cine_reset" -  this will allow to see the cinematic again when clicking on the ladder (by default the game shows it only once)

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The sessions CINE_ClimbUp and CINE_ClimbDown represent two distinct cinematic cutscenes that depict climbing up and down a ladder between the Underdark and Goblin Camp. Since these actions are inherently sequential (you cannot climb down without first climbing up), CINE_ClimbUp must occur before CINE_ClimbDown. Therefore, CINE_ClimbUp is the predecessor to CINE_ClimbDown. There are no mutually exclusive sessions in this context, as both sessions represent different actions that can logically occur in sequence.
